data.text: “Invân Rêngram chu mi inkhatin a grapebila mi senkhat inloa sintho rang rokin jîng renga ajôkpai angin ani.
Ama'n a sinthopungei hah asûna duli pêk ngei rangin a jôta, male a grapebila sintho rangin a tîr ngei zoi.
Jîng dâr kuo ânringin chu bazar muna a se nôka, mahan mi senkhat ite tho loia an inding ava mua,
masikin an kôm, ‘Nangni khom se ungla, grapebila va sin ungla, rathaman asadên nangni pêk ki tih,’ a tipe ngeia.
Masikin an se zoi. Hanchu sûn dâr sômleinik le chonûk dâr thuma khom ma angdênin a thoa.
Kholoi dâr rangnga ânring rangtôn bazar muna ava se nôka, mi senkhat ite sin loia ânding chien ava mu ngei nôka. An kôm, ‘Ithomo ite sin loiin mahin sûn nin min hek?’ tiin a rekel ngeia.
Anni han a kôm, ‘tutên mi min lo mak ngei,’ tiin an thuona. Asa, hanchu, nangni khom se ungla grapebila sin va tho roi,” a tipe ngeia.

Kholoi ahong nîn chu, a pumapa han a sum vongpu kôm han, “Sinthopu ngei hah koi inla, anûktaka hong inlopu ngei renga phutin amasataka hong inlopu ngei dênin an rathaman pêk ngei roh,”20:8: Och 19:13; Bal 24:15 a tia.
Kholoi dâr rangnga sintho koppu ngei ha chu duli chit pêk an nia.
Masikin motontaka sintho koppu ngei hah an hongin chu atam uol man rangin an mindona; hannirese anni khom duli chit kêng pêk an ni.
An sum hah an lâka, a pumapa chunga an chier phut zoi.
“Hi mi nûktaka hôn lo ngei hi chu dâr khat vai an sinna ania, keini chu nisa luma sûntuonin kin sina, hannoma, keini mi ni pêk dôr nanâk anni khom ne pêka!” an tia.
A pumapa han, an lâia inkhat kôm han, “ ‘Rangâi ta, mal,’ nang huong mu-ung. Ikhomnirse asûna duli loa sintho ranga no jôt ani.
Atûn na rathaman lâk inla, ni ina se roh. Nangma nang ke pêk dôr hih hi anûktaka a hon lopu khom hih pêk ku nuom ani.
Ka sum chu ki ti lamtaka mang rangin rachamneina dôn mu-ung mo? Aninônchu ka mannarloi sikin na narsa mini?” a tipea.
Hanchu Jisua'n, “Masikin anûktak ngei hah amotontak la nîng an ta, amotontak ngei hah anûktak la nîng an tih,”20:16: Mat 19:30; Mk 10:31; Luk 13:30 tiin chongkhârnân a tia.
Jisua Jerusalem tena se lâihan, ruoisingei sômleinik hah an theiin a tuong ngeia, lampuia an lôn pumin inrûkten an kôm,
“Rangâi ta u, Jerusalema ei se rang ania, mahan Miriem Nâipasal hi Ochaisingei le Balam minchupungei kuta minsûrin om a tih. Thi rangin theiloimintum an ta,
hanchu Jentailngei kuta pêk an ta, anni han munui inzanân mang an ta, vîk an ta, khrosa jêmdel an tih; hannirese sûnthum suole chu aringin kaithoiin om a tih,” a tia.
Hanchu Jebedee lômnu hah a nâipasal inik ngei leh Jisua kôm an honga, amakunga khûkinbilin, a lungkhamna a zonga.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Imo nu nuom?” tiin amanu hah a rekela.
Jisua'n, nâipasalngei kôm han, “Nin zong hih nin riet loi ani, Tuongna kilât ki nêk rang hih nin nêk thei rang mo?” a tia.

Jisua'n an kôm, “Ki kilât chu nêk tatak nan ta,” hannirese, “tumo ka chang tieng le ko voi tienga ânsung rang chu keiman zen rangin racham dôn mu-ung. Hi munngei hih chu ka Pa'n a mintuo pe ngei ta rang kêng ani,” a tia.
Ruoisi dang sômngei han ma chong hah an rietin chu, lâibung inik ngei chunga an ningathik zoia.

Masikin Jisua'n an rêngin a koitûp ngeia, an kôm, “Jentailngei chunga roijêkpua an phunngei chu an chunga an inlaltatak ngâia, an ruoipungei khom an chunga rachamneina an dôn ok ngâi iti nin riet.20:25-26: Luk 22:25-26
Nikhomrese, nin lâia chu ma anghin ani rang nimak. Tukhomin alien a nuomin chu, nin tîrlâm ani bak ngêt rang ani;20:26-27: Mat 23:11; Mk 9:35; Luk 22:26
Mapêna, nin lâia tukhomin amotontak ani nuomin chu nin tîrlâm a chang bak ngêt rang ani.
Miriem Nâipasal luo mana min a sin an tho pe rangin juong maka, mi sin tho pe rang le mi tamtak rattan ranga a ringna pêk rangin kêng a juong ani,” a tia.
Jisua le a ruoisingei Jericho hah an mâkin chu, mipui tamtakin an jûia.
Mitcho inik lampui kôla insungin Jisua a hongvun iti an rietin chu, “David Nâipasal! Kin chunga inrieng mi mu roh, Pu!” tiin an in-ieka.
Mipui ngei han dâirek rangin an ngo ngeia. Aniatachu anni han, “David Nâipasal! Kin chunga inrieng mimu roh, Pu!” tiin an iniek minring uola.
Jisua ânngama a koi ngeia, “Imo nangni rangin ni min tho nin nuom?” tiin a rekel ngeia.
“Pu, mitvârna mi ni pêk rang hih kin nuom ani!” tiin an thuona.
Jisua'n an chunga inriengmuna a dôna, an mitngei hah a tôn pe ngeia, voikhatrengin an hong mu thei kelena, a nûk an jûi zoi ani.
